page.title: 08A TENANT FARMER...
page.content: {A tenant farmer - Mr. Cooper} Mr. Cooper has a mixed farm which means that he has cereals and animals. The farm is called Court Farm because the judicial court used to sit there. He has about 416 acres and employs one man plus a student at harvest. He likes farming and thinks it is a worthwhile job. The farm is about 500 years old. He has lived there for 22. Mr. Cooper and his employee work about ten hours a day. They have tractors, combine harvesters, cultivating machines and spraying equipment to help them. The busiest times of the year are autumn and spring; the rest of the time it is quiet. The stock on the farm is mainly beef cattle and Mr. Cooper breeds shire horses as a hobby.
